snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Agency is reviewing whether a recall last year fixed malfunctioning passenger airbags in one million Nissan vehicles.
abstract: Nissan faces possibility of second recall of over one million vehicles after National Highway Traffic Safety Administration receives numerous reports that bug in software controlling deployment of passenger airbag may not have been fixed in 2014 recall.
lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Agency is reviewing whether a recall last year fixed malfunctioning passenger airbags in one million Nissan vehicles.

headline.main: Nissan May Repeat Recall Over Airbags
headline.print_headline: Nissan May Repeat Recall Over Airbags
